issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw: We should fix this in the `sdf_2.0` branch, and make a patch release.
content.html: We should fix this in the sdf_2.0 branch, and make a patch release.

issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw: ACK, thanks. I will take care of it.
content.html: ACK, thanks. I will take care of it.

issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw:
I've update the code to latest 0.3.0 urdfdom and move the old collision_groups and visuals_groups members to the _array in commit  8f7233c (as well as remove the conditional code that was depending on the external urdfdom).

Things are still not compiling since we need to modify our functions to adapt them to the remove of collision_group. Mainly:

```
void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr _link,
    const std::string &_groupName, UrdfVisualPtr _visual)
```
Since I think that the concept of group does not exists anymore.

I'm afraid that I don't understand the code well enough to change this without breaking things, so @nkoenig @scpeters @hsu could you please finish this? The work is in the ```update_urdfdom_0.3``` branch.
content.html:
I've update the code to latest 0.3.0 urdfdom and move the old collision_groups and visuals_groups members to the _array in commit 8f7233c (as well as remove the conditional code that was depending on the external urdfdom).

Things are still not compiling since we need to modify our functions to adapt them to the remove of collision_group. Mainly:

void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr _link,
    const std::string &_groupName, UrdfVisualPtr _visual)

Since I think that the concept of group does not exists anymore.

I'm afraid that I don't understand the code well enough to change this without breaking things, so @nkoenig @scpeters @hsu could you please finish this? The work is in the update_urdfdom_0.3 branch.

issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw: As of 986f381, it builds on my mac with `-DUSE_EXTERNAL_URDF=True`, though it [fails on drone.io](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/117). We should add some tests now to figure out how we want to do collision names with fixed joint reduction.
content.html: As of 986f381, it builds on my mac with -DUSE_EXTERNAL_URDF=True, though it fails on drone.io. We should add some tests now to figure out how we want to do collision names with fixed joint reduction.

issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw:
Seems like clang is more robust to bad syntax, I've fixed that for gcc in a425fcb. Also fix a warning in 7863cf6. I will prepare the pull request.

Thanks for taking care of fix it Steve.
content.html:
Seems like clang is more robust to bad syntax, I've fixed that for gcc in a425fcb. Also fix a warning in 7863cf6. I will prepare the pull request.

Thanks for taking care of fix it Steve.

issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw: We need to merge this branch with sdf_2.0, so that we have the symbol `URDF_GE_0P3`. I think we need to support urdfdom versions 0.2 and 0.3 for quite a while.
content.html: We need to merge this branch with sdf_2.0, so that we have the symbol URDF_GE_0P3. I think we need to support urdfdom versions 0.2 and 0.3 for quite a while.

issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw:
I made some fixes in 6a3db10 (branch `update_urdfdom_0.3_jrivero`) for getting the branch to compile.

We need to fix a couple of invalid pointers in tests.
```
[==========] Running 3 tests from 1 test case.
[----------] Global test environment set-up.
[----------] 3 tests from SDFParser
[ RUN      ] SDFParser.FixedJointReductionEquivalenceTest
*** Error in `/home/jrivero/code/sdformat3/build/test/integration/INTEGRATION_fixed_joint_reduction': free(): invalid pointer: 0x000000000088c7c0 ***

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
0x00007ffff54d8077 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
56	../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff54d8077 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:56
#1  0x00007ffff54d9458 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89

#5  0x00007ffff7b5a7f2 in boost::checked_delete<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual>, std::allocator<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual> > > > (x=0x88c7c0)
    at /usr/include/boost/checked_delete.hpp:34
#6  0x00007ffff7b5d21e in boost::detail::sp_counted_impl_p<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual>, std::allocator<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual> > > >::dispose (this=0x861f20)
    at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/sp_counted_impl.hpp:78
#7  0x00007ffff7b0ce40 in boost::detail::sp_counted_base::release (this=0x861f20) at /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/detail/sp_counted_base_gcc_x86.hpp:146
```
